name: eXpel
detailed_description:
Question 1: So what is EXPEL?

Answer: This is a pc game that leans between pure survival with a very similar construction system and a weapon system thought between arcade and simulation

Question 2: And if not we can do what ???

Answer: You can (for the moment) create a base, weapons, fight your friends and after a while I would like to open servers that can go to a minimum of 25 to 250 players which would be great.
about_the_game:
Question 1: So what is EXPEL?

Answer: This is a pc game that leans between pure survival with a very similar construction system and a weapon system thought between arcade and simulation

Question 2: And if not we can do what ???

Answer: You can (for the moment) create a base, weapons, fight your friends and after a while I would like to open servers that can go to a minimum of 25 to 250 players which would be great.
short_description: EXPEL is an multiplayer survival open world game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit and better
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4XXX
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6Go
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Graphics: GTX 750 ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
